title: How to Use a Multi Purpose Spill Kit

steps.headline: Use the open slippery floor spill kit case as a caution barrier around the spill.
Put on protective gloves and overshoes provided.
Sprinkle absorbent granules over the spill, working from the outer edge to the centre.
Once gel is formed (60 seconds max), use scraper and dustpan to remove congealed spill and any associated spill packaging.
Place contents of dustpan into waste bag provided.
Use scraper, dustpan and brush as required until spill has been completely removed.
Use hard surface wipes to further clean spill area.
steps.description: Place used wipes into waste bag.

steps.headline: Use hard surface wipes to clean scraper, dustpan and brush.
steps.description: Place used wipes into waste bag.

steps.headline: Return granules, wipes, scraper, dustpan and brush to relevant places within the spill kit.
steps.description: Remove protective clothing and put into waste bag.

text: Use the open slippery floor spill kit case as a caution barrier around the spill.  Put on protective gloves and overshoes provided.  Sprinkle absorbent granules over the spill, working from the outer edge to the centre.  Once gel is formed (60 seconds max), use scraper and dustpan to remove congealed spill and any associated spill packaging.  Place contents of dustpan into waste bag provided.  Use scraper, dustpan and brush as required until spill has been completely removed.  Use hard surface wipes to further clean spill area. Place used wipes into waste bag. Use hard surface wipes to clean scraper, dustpan and brush. Place used wipes into waste bag. Return granules, wipes, scraper, dustpan and brush to relevant places within the spill kit. Remove protective clothing and put into waste bag.
